Pre-Game Insights: Argentina will be without Lionel Messi due to injury; Paulo Dybala may wear the number 10 shirt; the team is using a 3-5-2 formation with Giovani Lo Celso and Nicolas Gonzalez in key positions; players like Julian Alvarez and Lautaro Martinez are expected to start in attack; Exequiel Palacios, Leonardo Balerdi, and Lucas Martinez Quarta are injured and not in the squad; Taty Castellanos, Matias Soule, Giuliano Simeone, and Ezequiel Fernandez may make their debuts; Argentina's possible starting lineup is listed
